metadata.title: CVE-2022-48653 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ice:Don't double unplug aux on peer initiated reset In the IDC callback that isaccessed when the aux drivers request a reset, the function to unplug theaux devices is called. This function is also called in theice_prepare_for_reset function. This double call is causing a "schedulingwhile atomic" BUG.
